summary: Hand made from scratch model and textures inspired by Thorin\'s axe from the recent hobbit movies.
descriptionHtml:
0.91

new textures: much darker axe head.

improved specular and diffuse, hopefully more metalish now and better details.


What is this mod?

Hand made from scratch model and textures inspired by Thorin\'s axe from the recent hobbit movies.

You can find it near the warrior guardian stone on your way to riverwood from helgan or at any other time. (check out photo\'s for location)

Has the standard stat\'s of a steel battleaxe and an enchantment giving 3 extra damage ignoring armor. It should give any new warrior build a nice edge for a few levels.

If you just want to try it out you can console it in with...

Help Thorin 4

Player.additem XX 000d63 1

in the console.

izon87604  was kind enough to review the axe, cheers mate :)

[youtube]7OSXK8f2gIE[/youtube]


Check out his channel here.

http://www.youtube.com/user/nozi87?feature=watch



INSTALLATION

Click the Download with Manager button in the files section to download to NMM.
Activate the mod in NMM. 

To manually install, just download the file and extract the files into the data folder. 


Premise:

This mod was a request from Nwaldinger 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5720001//?

Who for some reason thinks I can make game assets!

He was really helpful and encouraging and is the main reason I went ahead and published this so if you like the mod drop by his profile and leave a Kudo :)

It\'s only the second model I\'ve made, so I instantly forgot all the things to avoid and did them again but there\'s no point leaving it on my hard drive and someone may get some fun from it :)

The armour breaker enchantment was an idea/comment by RedRiver80 on one of the development photo\'s, thanks dude.
author: KettleWitch
